lead_paragraph: When Democratic leaders mapped out their final week in Washington before the August recess and the official start of campaign season, they could not have anticipated this.
snippet: In the final week before the August recess, Democratic leaders in Congress find themselves in the middle of ethics inquiries and debates over tax cuts.

headline.main: The Early Word: A Long Week

abstract: In the final week before the August recess, Democratic leaders in Congress find themselves in the middle of ethics inquiries and debates over tax cuts.
